intro: Aneilema tetraspermum, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers that are typically violet or purple in color. It has thick, waxy leaves that help it retain moisture in its native habitat. Aneilema tetraspermum is often cultivated as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
